post:
We just recently began offering virtual dedicated servers and I am extending an offer for the following packages:


Business VDS: $40.00/month
-----------------
Disk Space: 5GB [includes OS load]
RAM: 256MB
OS: Any flavor of Linux, FreeBSD
Transfer: 250GB/month
Control: http://www.webmin.com
Installed Software: To your specifications


Business VDS: $70.00/month
-----------------
Disk Space: 10GB [includes OS load]
RAM: 512MB
OS: Any flavor of Linux, FreeBSD
Transfer: 500GB/month
Control: http://www.webmin.com
Installed Software: To your specifications



Both plans include:
Managed E-Mail Accounts
Virtual Private Nameservers
Unique/Dedicated IP Address
Managed Domain Name Services (DNS)
Unlimited E-Mail Aliases/Forwarders per Domain
Anti-Spam Filters, Virus Scanning



WEB SITE:
http://www.webworkzcentral.com/inde...dicated_servers




HARDWARE SPECIFICATIONS:
4 VPS per server.
Dual P3 1.7 Ghz
1.5GB RAM
5 x 12GB SCSI [array, RAID]



BANDWIDTH TEST:
Here is a 13MB file to run a speed test off of:

http://webworkznetwork.com/speedtest.tar.gz

It's a copy of MySQL.





LIMITATIONS:

No IRC allowed.
